DisplayName.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Dundee's Hunting Knife

Description.value: The settlement needs bone knives for their carcass carving class. Craft tons of bone knives in exchange for a named Hunting Knife.

Author.value: ShoudenKalferas, Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Modlet, 7DaystoDie.JP, PaLoALo, ArkAngel
